general

Class SupportFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • general.SupportFunctions

  • public class SupportFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by all creation of fuzzy sets primitives.
    Author:
    Marcos Almendres.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double resolution
      Number of points to evaluate continuous sets.

                          throws org.nlogo.api.ExtensionException
        Checks the format of Logistic,Exponential and Gaussian sets
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters of the set
        n - Integer to check if 3 or 4 parameters required
        Returns:
